Slide 28 of 55

Notes:

    You will often have to change the settings in your browser. Other things you can do is set up helper applications, or clear your network cache.
    See also
    http://www.vu.msu.edu/preview/cps291/faq/plugins/
    http://www.vu.msu.edu/preview/cps291/faq/uninstall/
    As an exercise, see if you can clear your network cache. In netscape, it is under Options | Network Preferences | Cache
    In Microsoft Explorer, it is View | Options | Advanced | Settings | Empty Folder
